resources.string: You need to enable Bluetooth to make eRouška work correctly
You need to enable Location Services to make eRouška work correctly
You need to disable Battery Saver to make eRouška work correctly
Application is paused. Don\'t forget to resume it.
Application is running and anonymously monitoring nearby phones.
With Bluetooth disabled, eRouška cannot create a list of nearby phones.\n\nEnable it by pressing \"Enable Bluetooth\".
Even though we don\'t use Location data, enable them in order for Bluetooth to work properly by using the button \"Enable Location Service\".

With Bluetooth and Location Services disabled, eRou\u0161ka cannot create a list of phones nearby.\n\nEven though we don\'t use Location data, please enable both services in order for Bluetooth to work properly by using the button \u201cEnable BT and Location Services\".
Application is running in the background and monitoring the surroundings. Please do not force stop the application. Keep Bluetooth enabled and use your phone as usual.

Application is now paused and is not collecting any data about your surroundings.\n\nEnable data collection and keep yourself and others safe. Don\'t forget to do that especially when leaving your home.
In case you are tested positive, we will contact you using your phone number %s. We will ask you to send us an anonymised list of phones which can be found under My data.
Your device does not support Bluetooth LE
eRouška needs Bluetooth to function properly
Bluetooth is part of Location Services. That\'s why we ask for permission to use Location tracking after you press \"Enable\". Confirm both requests so that the application can function properly.
You are the only one who can upload the collected data, and only when asked to do so by a public health officer.
You don\'t have to worry: the application is not tracking your location nor does it save it.
Enter your phone number that will be used by a public health officer only when somebody from your surroundings has tested positive for coronavirus.

I agree that the Ministry of Health can use this phone number and the collected data about meeting other application users according to the terms and conditions to carry our epidemiological investigation.
Invalid phone number (must contain country prefix)
Verification code was not entered correctly.
Error contacting server. Check network connection.
Too many phone number verification requests. You can try again in a couple of hours.
You cannot use this number.\nPhone number %1$s cannot be used because you have used it for activation on a different device.
Verification code has expired. Check phone number and request a new verification code.

This is a list of signal measurements of nearby phones with eRouška in the past %d days. Data does not contain coordinates nor any other personal data. You are the only one who can send the data to the public health officers.

This application was created under the Covid19CZ initiative. We have developed it with focus on privacy protection so that we wanted to use it ourselves as well. Your data is stored only on your device and your location history cannot be determined from it. Thank you for using the application and we believe that together we will overcome this epidemic.\n\neRou\u0161ka team
The permission for location tracking needs to be granted to allow the application work properly.
You can find more information about why that is in Help.

The application will be monitoring your surroundings continuously and will record all other phones of users with the eRouška application you encounter.

If any of them test positive for coronavirus, a public health officer will call you.

If you test positive, the public health office will contact all the other application users you encountered.

The independent audit guarantees that the application does not send any personal data without your knowledge. Only you may send them and only to the public health officers.
Thanks to eRou\u0161ka you will keep yourself and others safe
We sent a verification code to phone number %s.
Verification code was automatically filled from the SMS.
Thinking you are positive for coronavirus?\n\nStay home and contact your general practitioner or your local public health office.

Do you need advice?

All questions and concerns about coronavirus should be answered on the Ministry\'s website or free phone line %s.

About application eRouška

Do you need help with the application or you want to know how it works? Write Anežka, eRouška support bot.
Data was already sent. You can send it again in %d minutes.

Were you asked by a public health officer to send a list of phones that you were in contact with?

The Ministry of Health and their public health officers will use the data based on your consent in conditions of data processing.

Hi, I\'m using application eRou\u0161ka. Install it too and together we can help stop the spread of coronavirus. The application collects anonymous data about nearby phones so that the public health officers can find potentially positive people more easily. The more we are, the better it works. Application can be found at %s.

Are you sure you want to delete your collected data?

Public health officers will lose the possibility to use your contacts in case of you get infected.

After deleting your data, eRouška will be automatically paused.

Are you sure you want to cancel your phone's registration?

After cancelling your phone registration we can no longer contact you in case somebody from your surrounding gets tested positive.

If you are the one who gets tested positive, we will not be able to contact anybody you encountered.

After cancelling the registration, all the devices registered with phone number %s will have their application turned off.

Are you sure you want to cancel your phone's registration?

After cancelling your registration, we can no longer contact people with whom you have been in touch.

By cancelling your registration, only the app on this device will be turned off because you didn't verify your phone number.
Data upload failed. Please try again later.
Your device seems to be offline.
Your account doesn\'t exist anymore or you were logged out.
All data was deleted and eRou\u0161ka was paused

Thank you for helping against the spread of coronavirus.

Please collaborate with public health officers to find all the people you were in contact with.

Stay in quarantine, limit contact with your family, and obey the orders of public health workers.
eRou\u0161ka needs to run on the background, but the phone is turning it off to save battery.\n\nDisable Battery Saver by pressing \"Disable Battery Saver\" in the settings.
eRou\u0161ka needs to be active even when you are not using it
Your phone is automatically turning off some applications when you are not using them to save battery life.
Enable running applications on background in your phone\'s settings. You can find the guide for your phone below.
Did you meet several people during the day? Check your phone\'s settings. It is possible that the application is being turned off automatically.
You consent with the conditions of data processing is necessary to activate the application. Without your consent, the application cannot work properly.
Unexpected error occurred. Try again later. If the error keeps occurring for a longer period, contact our support.
You didn\'t get SMS with verification code? Start using the application right now and verify your phone later.
Please verify your phone number so that we can contact you in case you have been infected.
Here is the history of contacts with other users of eRouška. It doesn\'t indicate their health status.
